The location speaks for itself, we are in the heart of Berlin Mitte and you have the perfect connection to all places. By S-Bahn it is 5 minutes to the main train station.

description:
The apartment is quietly located in the side street, very bright with balcony and is fully equipped.
Friedrichsfelde has excellent transport connections to public transport: Tierpark and Friedrichsfelde U-Bahn station, the S-Bahn stations Karlshorst with regional train connection as well as Friedrichsfelde Ost, with the tram M17 directly in front of the door. Shopping center, doctors, supermarkets and weekly market are nearby, as well as the zoo and the large Wuhlheide.

description:
Welcome to My Berlin Space!

Hello, I’m Julia, your host from Berlin.

In March 2024, I have decided to offer my apartment for rent.

Feel free to reach out - I’m here to assist you throughout your stay. 😊

—

Disclaimer:

Unfortunately, I am currently only accepting booking requests from Airbnb users who already have positive reviews. Since, when not hosting guests, I usually live in this apartment, it’s essential for me to maintain a comfortable and clean environment.

name: Wunderschöne, helle Wohnung
description:
The apartment is located in the tranquil Bötzowkiez with cafes and restaurants, near the Volkspark Friedrichshain, the Wins- and Kollwitzkiez.
With the M10 and the M4 in the immediate vicinity, you can drive to Mitte to Alexanderplatz, Hackescher Markt etc or to the main train station, natural history museum and Kreuzberg within a few minutes.
The bedroom is facing the green backyard and is wonderfully quiet.
The apartment is friendly bright through its large windows and quiet despite the central location.

name: Stilvolle Stuck-Altbauwohnung
description:
Urban living in classic old building with modern, stylish furnishings and high-quality technical equipment.
Due to its central location in the trendy Acacia district (Schöneberg district) with diverse gastronomic offerings, numerous shopping opportunities and an ideal transport connection, you will discover Berlin's highlights quickly and conveniently with buses, S-Bahn and U-Bahn, which can be reached on foot in 5 minutes.

name: Eckhaus mit Vorzügen
description:
Welcome to our beautiful house in Zehlendorf, Berlin! With a garden, a terrace, a balcony and underfloor heating, our house offers the perfect retreat for your stay in the city.

The house has three bedrooms that comfortably accommodate a total of 5 people. The well-keptness of our garden and our large barbecue offer you the possibility to relax outdoors and enjoy the warm summer evenings.

name: Studio  Ela Apartments Berlin
description: This stylish accommodation is perfect for group travel.

name: Old Luxury with Fully Equipped Home Office.
description: Experience the charm of a renovated heritage building in Berlin's prestigious Prenzlauer Berg. Nestled in the quite Helmholzkiez, this exquisite apartment combines historic elegance with modern comfort. Featuring designer furnishings, two spacious bedrooms, a work area with a screen and printer, a luxurious bathroom with a washer-dryer, and a quiet courtyard-facing balcony. The fully equipped kitchen boasts a high-end Bora cooktop, perfect for amateur chefs. Ideal for relaxation and city access.

name: Spacious, bright apartment - perfect for families!
description:
Quiet and bright apartment on the 3rd floor of an old, fully renovated building, no escalator. 5 separate rooms (2 children's rooms, study, a guest room and parents bedroom) plus a spacious living room and a large living-kitchen with open dining area. 2 baths, one with shower, one with bath tub, sauna with an extra shower. Plenty of daylight, windows facing east and west. No windows out to the street, very quiet.
We love travelling and so we love to welcome travellers, wherever you come from!

name: Lush vibrant pad in the heart of BLN
description:
Neukölln is not the middle of Berlin but it is the beating heart. Come stay with us in our playful plant-filled apartment in the most exciting neighbourhood. Close to good public transport and all the cultural options you could ever want.

We have a large outdoor area with a BBQ for those warm summer nights before you head out the door to explore Späti culture or dance until daybreak.

The building is in a very vibrant and culturally diverse neigbourhood, but it is off the street so it's quiet

name: Wonderful new apartment in Berlin
description:
A cosy, meticulously decorated, 60m2 apartment with two bedrooms, a bathroom and a spacious living room with a fully equipped open-plan kitchen and dining room. All of the rooms overlook a tree-lined inner courtyard, which provides the perfect conditions for a well-deserved rest after a day exploring Berlin!
What happens in Berlin, stays in Berlin!

There's a laundry in front of the hotel.

Book me now!

name: gekoFeWo
description:
Good connection: in 10 minutes to the highway, in 25 minutes to Alexanderplatz by public transport. Many parks nearby, e.g. Schlosspark (Schloss Niederschönhausen) with outdoor swimming pool Pankow, children's farm "Pinke-Panke" in the Bürgerpark. The main train station is accessible by public transport (30-45´). To the "Alte Fasanerie" of Lübars or the Botanical Volkspark Blankenfelde in 30 minutes by public transport.
Within a 10-minute walk, a REWE supermarket, as well as a bakery. Numerous shopping opportunities in Pankow, e.g. City Hall Center.

description:
Stylish single apartment with separate entrance in Berlin-Pankow (Niederschönhausen)
This pretty apartment is very quiet and can accommodate two persons (bed 1.40 m). It has a fully equipped kitchen and a well-kept bathroom. The piano gives the apartment special charm. The tram is 5 minutes on foot and takes just 20 minutes directly to the lively trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg and in 30 minutes to Museum Island. Perfect for those who appreciate proximity to the city and tranquility alike.

There's a fully functional kitchen, TV and large dining table.

Fully furnished apartment in the best part of Kreuzberg. Most beautiful sights nearby, such as Tempelhofer Feld, Bergmannkiez, Gräfekiez, and Maybachufer. Looking for a subtenant from 01.03.23 onwards to 11.06.23.

With the high walls and the floorboards, the apartment offers a special charm. Also the pieces of furniture, which were all individually and lovingly selected, give every guest the feeling of being at home.

In the morning sun on the balcony, have breakfast with direct views of the park and the beautiful Bull fountain. Central yet quiet location. Large bright rooms, spacious hallway, an apartment to breathe in, arrive, feel good.

description:
Unwind in this charming 1880s apartment, blending vintage elegance with modern comforts. The 27m² bedroom features original wood floors, moulding, antique furniture, a work desk, and a private balcony.

Thick walls ensure privacy in the 94m² apartment, and you'll have access to brand-new amenities: washing machine, dishwasher, stove, oven, microwave, and fridge/freezer. The main renter occupies the other bedroom. Perfectly located: 30 seconds to Landwehr Canal and Görlitzer Park.

description:
A small, fully furnished maisonette located in a historic building, seamlessly integrated within a spacious loft
consisting in a living room equipped with shared kitchen, a bath and a bedroom.

This chic open-space concept is located in Kreuzberg’s hip young neighborhood, ideal for couples or solo travelers.
The place features a beautiful terrace on the garden, where guests can enjoy fresh air or a glass of wine while looking out at the complex’s courtyard .

name: Sunny room in the heart of Neukölln
description: My apartment is located in a typical Berliner Altbau building in the heart of the lively part of Neukölln. You will be sleeping in a quiet and sunny room, facing the backyard into lots of green during the summer month. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need (there is a washig mashine,too!). The style of the place is artsy and eclectic and I will be happy giving you some tipps for the neighborhood.

name: house with garden & excellent connections
description:
House with everything you need for a family vacation in Berlin - quietly located near the Spandauer Forest with playgrounds, close to lakes, and very good transport connections.

In the large garden, you will find a small pool, slide, swing, fire pit, and a grill.

The house itself convinces with two bathrooms, a study, two bedrooms, as well as a children’s room that will make the little ones’ dreams come true. A highlight is the ping pong table in the basement.

name: Grand design apartment Mauerpark
description:
A newly renovated design apartment in Prenzlauer Berg, central Berlin with cosy bedroom, perfect for a trip to Berlin and surrounding areas.

A stone's throw from public transport at Eberswalde Straße and Schönhauser Allee, right behind famous Mauerpark.

When we're not travelling with work or for fun, this is our home, and we hope you'll love your stay as much as we enjoy our time here.

Welcome to our cosy apartment in the heart of Berlin! Our apartment is located directly on the famous street Unter den Linden, just a stone's throw from the Brandenburg Gate and the train station "Friedrichstraße". This prime location offers you the perfect blend of culture, history and modern city life.

The room is great for couples, solo travelers, and business travelers.

The apartment has two large rooms with stucco, original floorboards and views to Graefestraße.

The kitchen is fully equipped and invites you to cozy cooking evenings. The bathroom has a bathtub and windows to the backyard.

Just 150 meters away from the food market - Marheineke Markthalle and 200 meters to subway station U7. Close walking distance to restaurants, cafes, record shops, flea markets and beautiful Hasenheide park. The apartment receives plenty of sunlight from the south and is situated on a very quiet street despite being very central. ☀️

description: Our apartment is a cozy and comfortable haven which we love spending our free days in, and we would like to invite you to experience the same! The building we live in is over 100 years old and has the typical charm of a Berlin Gründerzeit building. Beautiful wooden floors, large windows, high ceilings typical of "Altbau" architecture, practical furniture, and stylish decorations are found throughout.

description:
Here you move into a quite large 4-room apartment in the best location.
You are right at the old west-east border crossing. The great thing is that the subway and tram are right outside the door and you also have a great infrastructure. Great restaurants, cafes and bars will certainly bring more fun and joy to your stay.

description: This is a cleverly designed studio apartment at the intersection of two of the most vibrant neighborhoods in the city- Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte. The finishes in the apartment are of the highest quality, and it is inside one of the area's most striking and historic buildings, adjacent to the Jewish Cemetery. It's directly opposite the U-Bahn and is an ideal base from which to explore Berlin.

name: Cozy 2-bedroom apartment 92m² with balcony.
description:
The beautiful 92-square-meter old building apartment, in excellent condition, features two bedrooms, a living room, and a fully equipped kitchen. It is centrally located in Berlin Friedrichshain.

The location is very convenient: everything is within walking distance. There are plenty of great restaurants and shopping options nearby, and I’m happy to provide recommendations – feel free to reach out with any questions.

Boxhagener Platz is a lovely spot to kick off your visit to Berlin.

name: elected apartment with a great sun terrace.
description:
Situation:

The apartment is located in the heart of Prenzlauwer Berg, halfway between Mauerpark and Helmholzplatz. The district is known for its internationality and a multitude of small cafes and restaurants from Asian to German cuisine. The public is predominantly young.

The underground station is only 200 m away.

The apartment is located on the top floor of the rear building in a new roof extension. There it is absolutely quiet.

name: Cozy flat on a quiet side-street
description:
Welcome to our little retreat in the heart of the city! This centrally located flat offers convenience and comfort for your stay. The apartment features beautiful wooden floors that add warmth and character to the space.

The bedroom comfortably sleeps two guests, while the pull-out couch in the living room provides additional sleeping arrangements for two more. Whether you're here for business or leisure, this charming flat provides the perfect base for your adventures.

name: Architektenwohnung in Kreuzberg
description:
Architect's apartment above the rooftops of Kreuzberg.

Welcome to our bright apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg!
It offers a bedroom with a large bed, a comfortable sofa bed for two, a fully equipped kitchen with cooking island and a modern bathroom with rain shower. The sunny balcony invites you to relax. Centrally located, with excellent connections, you can easily reach restaurants, markets and Berlin's highlights. Perfect for exploring the city and feeling at home!

name: Studio-apartment in Kreuzberg.
description:
This is my Home and Studio since many years, and now live here with my partner. It means you’ll be staying in a place which is very much lived and vibrant, surrounded by books, canvases, flowers and lots of personal items. While you are welcome to enjoy the comfort of this place, l need you to also take good care of it.
So please introduce yourself and let’s get to know each other so l can feel confortable in letting you live here while out of town.

name: Family friendly apartment in Neukölln with Sauna
description: Our home is a fairly large Jugendstil Altbau style apartment situated on the ground floor in a quiet road close to all the Neukölln independent bars restaurants and shops around Weserstrasse. We have recently renovated our space. There are 3 main rooms - a workspace and living area, a family room including a 'tiny house' within it and a large double bedroom. This is a great launchpad for discovering the city of Berlin. We are officially registered to rent our home (Reg. Number) 08/Z/RA/011858-22

name: Flattering Berlin 18
description:
Enjoy this newly renovated spacious apartment in the vibrant heart of Berlin. Here you'll find the perfect mix of modern style in addition to the comfort of home. Prepare your favorite meals in the spacious kitchen, relax in the dining room, or explore the incredible array of entertainment and fun the city has to offer.
You will feel at home as you immerse yourself in all that this amazing destination has to offer.

name: 4/ X Loft Art Design 2 BR Factory Kreuzberg bright
description: In a quiet backyard between the hip Kreuzberg and Mitte, you will find relaxation in our stylish loft. Enjoy the central location and explore Berlin's food & lifestyle scene easily on foot. Furnished with high quality vintage design classics and comfortable amenities (Bruno Ray ,De Sede, Lehni, Zieta, B&B Italia, Moroso, Tapioviaara, Artemide and contemporary art by renowned German artists, your stay becomes a unique experience.

The price includes a 5% Occupancy Tax.
If the guest is in Berlin on a business trip, the Occupancy Tax is not charged & will be paid back to the guest.

Lower level has bright open living/dining area, leading into stainless steel kitchen and access to the balcony with a simple bathroom. Upstairs has an open work area, a tv space, floating box bedroom with double bed (160x200) and a hidden second bedroom with double bed (145x200), main bathroom with shower, bath tub & Infrared Sauna, Sonos speaker available.

Near the lively barstreet Weserstr. and the canal, in central Neukölln, neighboring Kreuzberg, Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte. Easy access to 2 subway stations connecting 2 major lines, with its numerous Sbahn connections, quick ride into Alexanderplatz and all other districts. Near park Tempelhofer Feld.

Quiet in the green and yet in the middle of the city. From the main station 10 minutes by bus. To Friedrichstraße 5 min, Brandenburg Gate 12 min by subway. Ideal for exploring the city.

The flat is located super central and close to the u-Bahn and sbahn (Ringbahn) which brings you around berlin very fast. It’s a calm street with cute bars and restaurants nearby.

It takes 10 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz and the East Side Gallery.
